title: Manage a Shift Change Handover
description: At the end of a shift, the outgoing operations manager must provide a complete handover to the incoming manager.

tasks.description: Review the status of all current vessel and yard operations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The outgoing manager gets a real-time summary of all ongoing activities.

tasks.description: Document any issues that occurred during the shift, such as equipment breakdowns or delays.
tasks.expected_outcome: A shift log is created detailing key events.

tasks.description: Conduct a face-to-face briefing with the incoming manager, going over the shift log and the plan for the next shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive handover is completed, ensuring continuity of operations.
